input.sentences: this is exactly what is supposed to happen when you get a girl pregnant | you get married .
i was just happy to see my son 's friends were so supportive .
here is them getting married | so happy together right now | but we 'll check back in 5 years and see how it goes .
these are my son 's friends | they do n't have a baby on the way | they are gon na wait until after college | very smart .
but | when you get a girl pregnant | you got ta bite the bullet and grow up fast | they just look so unprepared for life .
output.sentences: It was supposed that Mary was pregnant when she got married and that that gave her her beautiful glow.
Her brother and best man to the groom looked dashing while playing the supportive son to the happy mother of the bride.
No one who checked out the happy couple kissing could doubt they seemed entirely happy.
Mary's brother is a smart son and will wait a few years no doubt before marrying his girlfriend.
Even if Mary was unprepared for marriage and motherhood, she looked very happy and ready to take on her new life as she left with her new husband.
